publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2959 Murdo Fraser: "Other Side of Scotland" Tourism Campaign—That the Parliament welcomes the "Other Side of Scotland" campaign developed by the area tourist boards in Aberdeen and Grampian, Angus and Dundee and the Kingdom of Fife; recognises the importance of the communities along Scotland’s spectacular east coast and the need to encourage more tourists to visit this area, and commends the partnership approach taken by the area tourist boards involved in the campaign in an effort to achieve this.
S1M-2959 "Other Side of Scotland" Tourism Campaign (lodged on 28 March 2002) Alex Johnstone*
S1M-2959 "Other Side of Scotland" Tourism Campaign (lodged on 28 March 2002) Mr Keith Raffan*
S1M-2959 "Other Side of Scotland" Tourism Campaign (lodged on 28 March 2002) Donald Gorrie*
S1M-2959 "Other Side of Scotland" Tourism Campaign (lodged on 28 March 2002) Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*
